hotel_policies.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before arrival.
hotel_policies.pet_policy: Pets under 10kg allowed with $50 cleaning fee.
hotel_policies.smoking_policy: All rooms are non-smoking. Designated smoking areas available.

local_guide.description: Large urban park ideal for walks, picnics, and outdoor sports.
Modern museum showcasing local history and art exhibits.

rooms.description: Cozy and practical room designed for solo travelers, offering comfort and privacy for short or long stays.
Comfortable room ideal for couples or two guests, featuring elegant decor and essential amenities for a pleasant stay.
Spacious room with two separate beds, perfect for friends or colleagues traveling together who prefer individual sleeping arrangements.
Stylish room with enhanced space and comfort, featuring a queen-size bed and amenities suited for both leisure and business travelers.

amenities.description: Outdoor pool perfect for leisure swims or laps, surrounded by sun loungers and lush gardens.

rules.age_restrictions: Children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

amenities.description: Fully equipped fitness center with cardio machines, free weights, and personal training services available.

rules.dress_code: Sports attire and proper footwear required.

amenities.description: Trendy bar serving craft cocktails, premium spirits, and a selection of wines in a stylish atmosphere.

rules.age_restrictions: Must be 21 years or older to enter.

amenities.description: Luxury spa offering massages, facials, and body treatments in a tranquil setting.

rules.dress_code: Bathrobes and slippers provided. Swimwear required for wet areas.

upselling_services.description: Indulge in our luxury spa with a range of massages, facials, and body treatments designed to rejuvenate body and mind.
upselling_services.availability: Available daily from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Advance booking recommended.

brunch.description: Waffles served with fresh berries and maple syrup.

packages.name: Romantic Escape Package
packages.description: Perfect for couples: includes a one-night stay in a Queen Room, champagne on arrival, spa massage for two, and late checkout.

packages.name: Spa Day Package
packages.description: Enjoy a day of relaxation with your choice of spa treatment, light lunch, and full access to our pool and gym.

discounts.name: Summer Special
discounts.description: Get 15% off all room types during July and August.

discounts.name: Loyalty Members Discount
discounts.description: Exclusive 20% discount for our loyalty program members on all bookings.

discounts.name: Advance Booking
discounts.description: Save $30 per night when booking 30 days in advance.

faq.question: difference between standard and deluxe rooms
faq.answer: At our hotel, standard rooms refer to Single, Double, or Twin rooms, while deluxe rooms refer to our Queen Room, offering more space, better views, and upgraded amenities.

faq.question: do rooms have a balcony
faq.answer: Some Queen Rooms have balconies, but Single, Double, and Twin Rooms do not include balconies.

faq.question: bathtub
faq.answer: Our rooms feature modern showers, but we do not have bathtubs in the guest rooms.

faq.question: connecting rooms
faq.answer: Yes, we have some connecting rooms available upon request. Please contact the front desk for availability.

faq.question: rooms for disabled guests
faq.answer: Yes, we offer accessible rooms designed for disabled guests, including wider doors, roll-in showers, and support rails. Please request an accessible room when booking.

faq.question: noise cancellation
faq.answer: All our guest rooms are designed with soundproofing materials, including double-glazed windows and insulated walls, to reduce outside noise and ensure a quiet and comfortable stay.

faq.question: meeting rooms
faq.answer: Yes, our hotel offers modern meeting rooms equipped with audio-visual facilities, high-speed Wi-Fi, and flexible seating arrangements. Ideal for business meetings or small conferences.

faq.question: banquet space
faq.answer: Our hotel features an elegant banquet hall suitable for weddings, social gatherings, and corporate events, accommodating up to 150 guests. Catering and décor services are available.

faq.question: event space
faq.answer: We have versatile event spaces that can be configured for meetings, workshops, cocktail receptions, or gala dinners. Please contact our events team for capacity details and packages.

faq.question: conference facilities
faq.answer: Our conference facilities include projector screens, sound systems, and dedicated event staff to ensure your meeting runs smoothly.

faq.question: capacity of meeting rooms
faq.answer: Our largest meeting room can host up to 50 participants in a theater-style setup. Smaller boardrooms are available for more intimate meetings of 10-20 guests.

faq.question: wedding venues
faq.answer: Yes, we host weddings in our beautiful banquet spaces and offer tailored wedding packages, including décor, catering, and coordination services.

faq.question: what time is check-in
faq.answer: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM.
alts: what time do you allow checkin

faq.question: what time is check-out
faq.answer: Check-out is at 12:00 PM.
alts: when do i need to check out
what time to leave the room

faq.question: is early check-in available
faq.answer: Early check-in is subject to availability on the day of arrival. Luggage storage is always available.

faq.question: is late checkout available
faq.answer: Late checkout may be available until 2:00 PM for an additional fee. Please check with the front desk a day before departure.

faq.question: do you offer airport shuttle
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a complimentary airport shuttle every hour from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM. Reserve via the front desk.

faq.question: is parking available
faq.answer: Yes, on-site self-parking is available for $15 per night. Spaces are subject to availability.

faq.question: do you have valet parking
faq.answer: We currently offer self-parking only; valet service is not available.

faq.question: ev charging
faq.answer: Yes, we have two EV charging spots on a first-come, first-served basis. Please bring your own adapter if required.

faq.question: breakfast hours
faq.answer: Breakfast is served from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM at the restaurant.

faq.question: restaurant hours
faq.answer: Our restaurant is open for lunch from 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM and for dinner from 6:00 PM to 10:00 PM.

faq.question: restaurant menu
faq.answer: You can view today’s restaurant menu at the front desk or via the QR code in the lobby.

faq.question: vegetarian vegan or gluten-free options
faq.answer: Yes, our restaurant offers vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. Please inform your server about any dietary needs.

faq.question: room service hours
faq.answer: Room service is available from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

faq.question: pool hours
faq.answer: The swimming pool is open from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

faq.question: gym hours
faq.answer: Our gym is open 24 hours for in-house guests.

faq.question: spa booking
faq.answer: Spa treatments are available daily from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Advance booking is recommended.

faq.question: do you offer luggage storage
faq.answer: Yes, we can store your luggage before check-in and after check-out at no additional cost.

faq.question: do you provide extra bed or crib
faq.answer: A rollaway bed can be arranged for $20 per night. Baby cots are complimentary, subject to availability.

faq.question: housekeeping frequency
faq.answer: Daily housekeeping is provided. Additional cleaning can be arranged on request.

faq.question: laundry service
faq.answer: Same-day laundry is available for items collected before 10:00 AM. Dry cleaning is also offered.

faq.question: do rooms have iron and hair dryer
faq.answer: Yes, each room includes a hair dryer and an iron with ironing board.

faq.question: is there a kettle or coffee maker
faq.answer: Yes, an electric kettle with tea and coffee supplies is provided in every room.

faq.question: wifi details
faq.answer: Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Typical speeds are 50 Mbps.

faq.question: business center and printing
faq.answer: Printing and scanning are available at the front desk. Charges may apply for large jobs.

faq.question: currency exchange or atm
faq.answer: There is an ATM in the lobby. Currency exchange is not offered on-site.

faq.question: power adapter
faq.answer: Power adapters are available at the front desk with a refundable deposit.

faq.question: smoking areas
faq.answer: All rooms are non-smoking. A designated smoking area is available outside the hotel entrance.

faq.question: are pets allowed
faq.answer: Pets under 10kg are allowed with a $50 cleaning fee. Please notify us in advance.

faq.question: security deposit
faq.answer: A refundable security hold of $100 may be placed on your card at check-in.

faq.question: taxes and fees
faq.answer: Local taxes and fees apply and will be shown during the booking process and on your invoice.

faq.question: lost and found
faq.answer: Please contact the front desk for lost and found items. We keep logged items for 30 days.

faq.question: wake up call
faq.answer: Yes, we can arrange a wake-up call at your preferred time.

faq.question: wheelchair access
faq.answer: Our public areas are wheelchair accessible and we offer accessible guest rooms with roll-in showers.

faq.question: distance to central park
faq.answer: Central Park is approximately 1.2 km from the hotel.

faq.question: can i modify or cancel my booking
faq.answer: Yes, subject to your rate plan. Most direct bookings allow free cancellation up to 24 hours before arrival.

faq.question: third party bookings
faq.answer: If you booked via an online travel agency, please contact them directly for changes. We’re happy to help with room requests.

faq.question: packed breakfast for early departure
faq.answer: Yes, we can arrange a packed breakfast for early check-outs when requested by 8:00 PM the day before.

faq.question: late night food options
faq.answer: A limited snack menu is available 24/7 at the front desk.

faq.question: minibar policy
faq.answer: Selected rooms include a minibar. Charges apply based on consumption.

faq.question: allergy friendly rooms
faq.answer: Hypoallergenic bedding is available on request. Please inform us of any allergies in advance.

faq.question: quiet rooms request
faq.answer: We can assign a room on a higher floor or away from elevators based on availability.

faq.question: porterage or luggage assistance
faq.answer: Yes, our team can assist with your luggage upon arrival and departure.

faq.question: invoice or bill request
faq.answer: An itemized invoice will be provided at checkout. If you need a company invoice, share details at check-in.

faq.question: extend my stay
faq.answer: Extensions are subject to availability. Please contact the front desk as early as possible to secure your room.

faq.question: group booking rates
faq.answer: For 5 or more rooms, our sales team can offer group rates and meeting packages.
